item.title: Cert Chain for a multi-domain Comondo Positive SSL
item.description: cat AddTrustExternalCARoot.crt COMODORSAAddTrustCA.crt COMODORSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt >> cert-chain.pem NOTE: This is the inverse of “Creating an SSL Bundle out of Comodo Positive SSL” which seems valid as well. Not sure if it’s valid in any order.

item.title: Creating an SSL Bundle out of Comodo Positive SSL
item.description: www.example.org.crt COMODORSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt COMODORSAAddTrustCA.crt AddTrustExternalCARoot.crt >> www.example.org-bundle.crt See details in https://helpdesk.ssls.com/hc/en-us/articles/203427642-How-to-install-a-SSL-certificate-on-a-NGINX-server

item.title: Getting CA-bundle for Comodo Certificates
item.description: Get it via chat to Comodo, one would pop-up from https://support.comodo.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/Article/View/1145/1/how-do-i-make-my-own-bundle-file-from-crt-files. Make sure you edit your profile where they could send the information.
